languages.text: "Я выслушаю его послание, и сама приму решение. Смерть забирает свое — так или иначе. Но в моих силах отсрочить приговор".
"I will listen, but I will make my own decision. Death claims all, one way or another. But it is within my power to stay the sentence."
languages.original_text: "Я выслушаю его послание, и сама приму решение. Смерть забирает свое — так или иначе. Но в моих силах отсрочить приговор".

traits.locale_text: "I will hear His word and then make the decision myself. Death claims all, one way or another. But it is within my power to stay the sentence."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will hear His word and then make the decision myself. Death claims all, one way or another. But it is within my power to stay the sentence."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will listen, but I will make my own decision. Death claims all, one way or another. But it is within my power to stay the sentence."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will listen, but I will make my own decision. Death claims all, one way or another. But it is within my power to stay the sentence."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will listen, but I will make my own decision. Death claims all, one way or another. But it is within my power to stay the sentence."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will listen, but I will make my own decision. Death claims all, one way or another. But it is within my power to stay the sentence."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: «Escucharé, pero la decisión final será mía. La muerte nos reclama a todos, de un modo u otro. Pero dictar sentencia entra dentro de mis atribuciones».
languages.original_text: "I will listen, but I will make my own decision. Death claims all, one way or another. But it is within my power to stay the sentence."

traits.locale_text: «Escucharé, pero la decisión final será mía. La muerte nos reclama a todos, de un modo u otro. Pero dictar sentencia entra dentro de mis atribuciones».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: 「話は聞くけれど、決断は自分で下すわ。いずれにしても、死はすべてを奪う。けれど、判決の保留は私の力の及ぶところよ」
languages.original_text: "I will listen, but I will make my own decision. Death claims all, one way or another. But it is within my power to stay the sentence."

traits.locale_text: 「話は聞くけれど、決断は自分で下すわ。いずれにしても、死はすべてを奪う。けれど、判決の保留は私の力の及ぶところよ」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: “我会倾听，但我会依照自己的判断做出决定。尽管死亡将带走一切，不论死法，但我有权延缓死刑。”
languages.original_text: "I will listen, but I will make my own decision. Death claims all, one way or another. But it is within my power to stay the sentence."

traits.locale_text: “我会倾听，但我会依照自己的判断做出决定。尽管死亡将带走一切，不论死法，但我有权延缓死刑。”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: "Ich werde zuhören, aber ich werde meine eigene Entscheidung treffen. Der Tod holt alle, so oder so. Aber es liegt in meiner Macht, die Strafe zu bestätigen."
languages.original_text: "I will listen, but I will make my own decision. Death claims all, one way or another. But it is within my power to stay the sentence."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde zuhören, aber ich werde meine eigene Entscheidung treffen. Der Tod holt alle, so oder so. Aber es liegt in meiner Macht, die Strafe zu bestätigen."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: « Je l'écouterai, mais je prendrai ma décision en mon âme et conscience. Si la mort finit toujours par triompher, d'une manière ou d'une autre, je détiens le pouvoir d'ajourner sa sentence. »
languages.original_text: "I will listen, but I will make my own decision. Death claims all, one way or another. But it is within my power to stay the sentence."

traits.locale_text: « Je l'écouterai, mais je prendrai ma décision en mon âme et conscience. Si la mort finit toujours par triompher, d'une manière ou d'une autre, je détiens le pouvoir d'ajourner sa sentence. »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.original_text: "I will listen, but I will make my own decision. Death claims all, one way or another. But it is within my power to stay the sentence."
